alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Denton; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 4:28PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Denton, northeastern Tarrant and northwestern Dallas Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 428 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Farmers Branch, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Plano, Irving, Grand Prairie, Carrollton, Lewisville, Flower Mound, Euless, Grapevine, Coppell, Farmers Branch, Southlake, University Park, Addison, Highland Park, Hebron, DFW Intl Airport, Dallas Love Field and Grapevine Lake. This includes Interstate 35E between mile markers 431 and 450. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
